name: Homeworld: Cataclysm
description:
CATACLYSM IS THE FIRST OFFICIAL "EPISODE" WITHIN THE HOMEWORLD UNIVERSE

Homeworld: Cataclysm, the next episode in the Homeworld universe, begins roughly 15 years after the events of the original game. Take command of a new ships and technology at your disposal. Lead your fleet through 17 single player missions as you struggle for position in the emerging order - and face the might of a mysterious and powerful new foe.

Improving upon the Homeworld interface, Cataclysm adds features such as waypoints and sensor screen attack commands that add a new dimension to the revolutionary combat and gameplay pioneered in Homeworld. You can also command an entirely new class of ships with new technologies and weaponry, such as mimic ships and multi-ion beam frigates. Cataclysm's multiplayer game allows you to play with 2 unique fleets, one of which consists of various Taiidan, Kushan, and pirate ships.

New ships, technology, and gameplay features. Refined interface.

17 new single player missions.

Multiplayer mode with room for eight via LAN or WON.net.
